entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, known for his love of magical creatures.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: A wizard and member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: hungarian horntail
entities.description: One of the dragons that are being kept at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dragon keepers
entities.description: The people responsible for taking care of the dragons.

relationships.description: Hagrid is caring for the Hungarian Horntail, as evidenced by his presence at the scene and his interaction with the dragon keepers.
Madame Maxime is observing the Hungarian Horntail, as she moves up to the fence to get a closer look.
Hagrid interacts with Charlie Weasley, who has come over to talk to him about the dragons.
